channel.title: Service on The Awakening
channel.description: Recent content in Service on The Awakening

item.title: Aunty Molly Long
item.description: To be loving, caring and heartful to animals is no question about religion or nationality but that of humanity. Aunty Molly Long, a 70 year old lady who resides in Taman Sri Andalas Klang has been a mother to about 20 stray cats and 5 stray dogs. She has been taking care of them for the past 12 years. Aunt Long is married with 2 children who understand their motherâ€™s love for animals.

item.title: Abundance is Divine Will
item.description: Aum Shri Sairam. Salutations to Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Baba, and thank you Swami for all the blessings. Dedication: I thank my beloved wife for her courage and composure and her unflagging love and support for the duration of my recent hospitalisation. It started with an unusual busy travel week, the 18th to 23rd February 2018. I drove a honeymoon couple on a tour, covering Malacca, Kuala Lumpur and Genting Highlands.

item.title: Blood Donation
item.description: Here I would like to share important information on blood donation and how it saves life. Please reach out to me for more information. Liquid Love donation saves lives. Blood Donation - What, Why and How .pdfv { margin: 10px auto 20px; display: block; }
